Package cryptoTrader.strategy

Class StrategyA

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptoTrader.strategy.StrategyA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StrategyInterface
    public class StrategyA
extends java.lang.Object
implements StrategyInterface
    Creates a StrategyA object in a singleton design pattern Performs trade using the appropriate rules Rule: "If the price of BTC < 50,000 and the price of ADA > 2, then buy 10 ADA"

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static StrategyA getInstance()
      This method is used to get the single instance of StrategyA If an instance doesn't already exists, it creates a new instance of StrategyA
      java.lang.String getStrategyName()
      This method returns the name of the strategy
      TradeResult performTrade​(java.lang.String trader, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> coinList, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> coinPrices)
      This method executes a trade according to a predefined set of rules.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static StrategyA getInstance()
        This method is used to get the single instance of StrategyA If an instance doesn't already exists, it creates a new instance of StrategyA
        Returns:
        StrategyA the instance of StrategyA

      • performTrade

        public TradeResult performTrade​(java.lang.String trader,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> coinList,
                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> coinPrices)
        This method executes a trade according to a predefined set of rules. This performs a trade as follows: If the price of BTC < 50,000 and the price of ADA > 2, then buy 10 ADA
        Specified by:
        performTrade in interface StrategyInterface
        Parameters:
        trader - This is the name of the trading broker that initiated this trade
        coinList - This is the list of coins that this strategy is interested in knowing the prices for performing a trade
        coinPrices - This is the list of prices corresponding to each coin in the list of coins in coinList
        Returns:
        TradeResult This method returns a TradeResult object storing the details of the trade performed

      • getStrategyName

        public java.lang.String getStrategyName()
        This method returns the name of the strategy
        Specified by:
        getStrategyName in interface StrategyInterface
        Returns:
        String This returns the name of the current strategy - "Strategy-A"
